title: With this whole support nunu with smite thing
body:
Riot I seriously doubt is gonna revert their descions on this one, I think as a community we should really see how viable this support with smite style is actually viable.

I'd say the best thing we can do for protest is make as many smurf accounts as possible where people only play support with smite.

replies.body: What i find funny is how everyone is defending this guy, but castrated the singed guy lol
I was personally fine with the singed guy and so were other figureheads such as Phylol
